description.en:
Event which is fired when a drag operation is canceled
use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being dragged
use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being dragged
use args.owner to get a reference to the widget
use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th that was being dragged
use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that was actually being dragged
description.jp:
Event which is fired when a drag operation is canceled
use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being dragged
use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being dragged
use args.owner to get a reference to the widget
use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th that was being dragged
use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that was actually being dragged

description.en:
Event which is fired when a drag operation ends on a column header
use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being dragged
use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being dragged
use args.owner to get a reference to the widget
use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th that was being dragged
use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that was actually being dragged

description.en:
Event which is fired when a drag operation begins on a column header
use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column being dragged
use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column being dragged
use args.owner to get a reference to the widget
use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th being dragged
use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that's actually being dragged

description.en:
Event which is fired when a column moving operation completes
use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was moved
use args.oldIndex to get the previous column index of the column that was moved
use args.newIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved
use args.owner to get a reference to the widget
description.jp:
Event which is fired when a column moving operation completes
use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was moved
use args.oldIndex to get the previous column index of the column that was moved
use args.newIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved
use args.owner to get a reference to the widget

description.en:
Event which is fired when a column moving operation is initiated
use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being moved
use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being moved
use args.targetIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved
use args.owner to get a reference to the widget
description.jp:

description.en:
event fired after the moving dialog has been closed.
The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget.
Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
Use ui.movingDialogElement to get a reference to the moving dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
Use ui.movingDialog to get a reference to the Moving Dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

description.en:
event fired when column moving is completed through dragging it in the moving dialog
The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget.
Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
Use ui.movingDialog to get a reference to the Moving Dialog element. This is a jQuery object.
Use ui.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being moved
Use ui.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being moved
Use ui.targetIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved

description.en:
event fired every time the moving dialog changes its position.
The handler function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridMoving widget.
Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget.
Use ui.movingDialogElement to get a reference to the moving dialog element. This is a jQuery object.
Use ui.originalPosition to get the original position of the moving dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.
Use ui.position to get the current position of the moving dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.

description.en: Specifies if header cells should include an additional button that opens a moving helper dropdown.
description.jp: Specifies if header cells should include an additional button that opens a moving helper dropdown.

description.en: A list of column settings that specifies moving options on a per column basis.
description.jp: A list of column settings that specifies moving options on a per column basis.

description.en: Defines if the column is allowed to be moved
description.jp: Defines if the column is allowed to be moved

description.en: Defines the index of the column for moving
description.jp: Defines the index of the column for moving

description.en: Defines the key of the column for moving
description.jp: Defines the key of the column for moving

description.en:
Specifies the opacity of the drag markup, while a column header is being dragged.
The value must be between 0 and 1. When GroupBy is enabled, the corresponding option in the GroupBy configuration
will be used with priority over this one.
description.jp:
Specifies the opacity of the drag markup, while a column header is being dragged.
The value must be between 0 and 1. When GroupBy is enabled, the corresponding option in the GroupBy configuration
will be used with priority over this one.

description.en: Specifies caption for the move first dropdown button
description.jp: Specifies caption for the move first dropdown button

description.en: Specifies caption for the move last dropdown button
description.jp: Specifies caption for the move last dropdown button

description.en: Specifies caption for the move left dropdown button
description.jp: Specifies caption for the move left dropdown button

description.en: Specifies caption for the move right dropdown button
description.jp: Specifies caption for the move right dropdown button

description.en: Specifies caption text for the feature chooser submenu button
description.jp: Specifies caption text for the feature chooser submenu button

description.en:
Specifies whether the contents of the column being dragged will get hidden. The option is only
relevant in immediate moving mode.
description.jp:
Specifies whether the contents of the column being dragged will get hidden. The option is only
relevant in immediate moving mode.

description.en: Specify the drag-and-drop mode for the feature
description.jp: Specify the drag-and-drop mode for the feature

description.en: Column headers will rearange as you drag with a space opening under the cursor for the header to be dropped on
description.jp: Column headers will rearange as you drag with a space opening under the cursor for the header to be dropped on

description.en: A clone of the header dragged will be created and indicators will be shown between columns to help navigate the drop.
description.jp: A clone of the header dragged will be created and indicators will be shown between columns to help navigate the drop.

description.en: Specify the way columns will be rearranged
description.jp: Specify the way columns will be rearranged

description.en: Columns will be rearranged through dom manipulation
description.jp: Columns will be rearranged through dom manipulation

description.en: Columns will not be rearranged but the grid will be rendered again with the new column order. Please note this option is incompatible with immediate move mode.
description.jp: Columns will not be rearranged but the grid will be rendered again with the new column order. Please note this option is incompatible with immediate move mode.

description.en: Specifies the length (in pixels) between the dragged column and the column edges below which the move operation is accepted
description.jp: Specifies the length (in pixels) between the dragged column and the column edges below which the move operation is accepted

description.en: Specifies time in milliseconds for animation duration to show/hide modal dialog
description.jp: Specifies time in milliseconds for animation duration to show/hide modal dialog

description.en: Specifies caption for each move up button in the column moving dialog
description.jp: Specifies caption for each move up button in the column moving dialog

description.en: Specifies caption for each move down button in the column moving dialog
description.jp: Specifies caption for each move down button in the column moving dialog

description.en: Specifies caption text for the column moving dialog
description.jp: Specifies caption text for the column moving dialog

description.en: Specifies caption text for the feature chooser entry
description.jp: Specifies caption text for the feature chooser entry

description.en: Specifies height of column moving dialog
description.jp: Specifies height of column moving dialog

description.en: Specifies width of column moving dialog
description.jp: Specifies width of column moving dialog

description.en: Specifies the length (in pixels) between the dragged column and the grid edges below which horizontal scrolling occurs
description.jp: Specifies the length (in pixels) between the dragged column and the grid edges below which horizontal scrolling occurs

description.en: Specifies tooltip text for the move indicator
description.jp: Specifies tooltip text for the move indicator

description.en: Specifies the length (in pixels) of each individual scroll operation
description.jp: Specifies the length (in pixels) of each individual scroll operation

description.en: Specifies a multiplier for the delay between subsequent scroll operations. The larger this number is, the slower scrolling will appear to be.
description.jp: Specifies a multiplier for the delay between subsequent scroll operations. The larger this number is, the slower scrolling will appear to be.
